snippet: Despite its military successes, Syria’s opposition has failed to shape a political strategy to win over many of its countrymen.
abstract: Syrian opposition and its international backers have failed to win support of much of country's population, including minorities, despite promises of equal rights for all citizens regardless of religion and ethnicity; analysts say opposition has not adequately outlined its political strategy.

byline.contributor: Hania Mourtada and Kareem Fahim contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Despite its military successes, Syria’s opposition has failed to shape a political strategy to win over many of its countrymen.

headline.seo: Syrian Opposition Finds Hearts and Minds Are Elusive
headline.main: Syrian Rebels Find Hearts and Minds Elusive
headline.print_headline: Rebels Find Hearts and Minds Elusive

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
